info.name: StartGoals API Collection - Complete
info.description: Complete API documentation for StartGoals Learning Management System with all available endpoints.

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Advanced React Development",
  "description": "Master React with hooks, context, and advanced patterns",
  "levelId": "{{BEGINNER_ID}}",
  "categoryId": "{{MOBILE_APP_CODE}}",
  "languageIds": ["{{ENGLISH_CODE}}"],
  "tags": ["React", "JavaScript", "Frontend"],
  "goals": ["Master React Hooks", "Build scalable applications"],
  "requirements": ["Basic JavaScript knowledge", "Code editor"],
  "isPaid": true,
  "price": 99.99,
  "type": "recorded",
  "thumbnailUrl": "https://example.com/thumbnail.jpg"
}

{
  "sessionTitle": "React Fundamentals Live Session",
  "description": "Interactive session on React basics",
  "scheduledStartTime": "2024-12-15T10:00:00Z",
  "duration": 3600,
  "maxParticipants": 50,
  "batchId": "{{BATCH_ID}}",
  "courseId": "{{COURSE_ID}}"
}

{
  "title": "E-commerce Website Template",
  "description": "A complete e-commerce website built with React and Node.js featuring product management, shopping cart, payment integration, and admin dashboard.",
  "shortDescription": "Modern e-commerce template with admin panel",
  "price": 49.99,
  "salePrice": 39.99,
  "categoryId": 1,
  "tags": [1, 2, 3],
  "techStack": ["React", "Node.js", "MongoDB", "Express"],
  "programmingLanguages": ["JavaScript", "CSS", "HTML"],
  "demoUrl": "https://demo.example.com",
  "previewImages": [
    "https://s3.amazonaws.com/bucket/preview1.jpg",
    "https://s3.amazonaws.com/bucket/preview2.jpg"
  ],
  "requirements": ["Node.js 14+", "MongoDB", "Basic React knowledge"],
  "features": ["Responsive design", "Admin panel", "Payment integration"],
  "compatibility": ["Chrome", "Firefox", "Safari", "Edge"],
  "license": "Regular License",
  "liveDemoUrl": "https://live-demo.example.com",
  "documentationUrl": "https://docs.example.com",
  "supportEmail": "support@example.com",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "difficulty": "intermediate",
  "estimatedTime": 120
}

{
